lexUnit.name: minimum.n
lexUnit.definition: COD: the least or smallest amount, extent, or intensity possible or recorded.

sentence.text: Claimed battery life is a minimum of three hours , which is fairly accurate .
A minimum of historical awareness and a willingness to confront our own past is what is needed to teach us that , quite as much as knowledge of ` Arab culture " .
The vouchers could be cashed by employers offering them a job contract for a minimum of two years .
In general , where the company is obliged to pay ex gratia amounts in excess of the legal minimum , the full cost of the redundancy payments including the legal minimum should normally be provided .
The concept of a three-figure minimum for all notation was introduced in the second edition .
As an absolute minimum they will hold the member liable for any failure to supervise .
As a general guideline it would not be worthwhile for people with less than an absolute minimum of £5,000 to invest per stock .
In Alabama 's West Jefferson Prison inmates are kept in tiny cells , with the bare minimum of furniture .
The percentage of young people staying on in full-time education after the legal minimum leaving age has increased during the last decade , as Figure 12.1 shows .
They wish to be told what they need to know , and often they wish to invest a minimum of energy in order to succeed .
A minimum of £60,000 would be needed to cover fees for two children attending public school from age nine to 18 .
IGS , for example , quotes £60 per person per day , with a minimum of four to a group .
Allow a minimum of 48 hours before filling with water .
A minimum of 7 mm lead shielding was used over the central area and over the body of each animal .
Warranties : MiLAN warrants all of its products for a minimum of 1 to 5 years , depending on the type of product .
The clean channel springs into life first , and with the absolute minimum of fuss and fiddling I had some sparkly clean sounds to play with .
Mark Manwaring said Benjamin Laing was serving a minimum of only 25 years after depriving Alison of 60 years of life and their father Matthew of 20 .
While others dashed about and fussed and worried , he achieved enviable results with the minimum of effort .
For Lloyd 's sales however , the minimum is £150,000 .
Keep brush strokes to a minimum .
But rigid timetables will be kept to a minimum .
